attributes.action: stop the government wasting taxpayers money and reduce all taxes taking tax on everything down to 1%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government tax us too much, they take advantage of the fact they have all this money and so as a way of paying back all taxes to be reduce to 1% or less. We deserve to treated fairly.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
